availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Mitchell (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah A. Humphrey Mitchell in Harrison County, Kentucky, on July 23, 1857. Father of Elizabeth Mitchell and Marium Mitchell. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned two enslaved individuals in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 917.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 38A-B.
